attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to re-establish the probity of the House of Commons by requiring the immediate removal of any scottish, welsh or northern irish constituency MP for as long as it remains the law that english constituency MPs are barred from voting on scottish, welsh and northern irish matters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government is a fraud of the voters of England.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
